definition: to investigate/to observe/to scout/to seek out and examine/to explore
to explore/to search out/to scout/to visit/to stretch forward
short name for Chahar Province 察哈爾|察哈尔[Cha2 ha1 er3]
variant of 察[cha2]
to examine/to inquire/to observe/to inspect/to look into/obvious/clearly evident

sentences.english: The script refers to this single-man walker as a modified scout walker.
sentences.chinese: 剧本称这种单人步行机为改造过的探察步行机。

sentences.english: He discovered, on closer inspection, that the rocks contained gold.
sentences.chinese: 经过更为仔细的探察，他发现这些岩石含金。

sentences.english: All welds shall be undetectable in finished work.
sentences.chinese: 完成设备的所有焊接应无法探察。

sentences.english: Or, our carbonation-detecting skills could be an accident.
sentences.chinese: 或者说，我们探察饱和碳酸的技巧可能是一次意外。

sentences.english: Exploration testing the new model is fairly straightforward.
sentences.chinese: 对新模型的探察测试简单明了。

sentences.english: The Emperor detached Domon's division of light cavalry to reconnoitre in that quarter.
sentences.chinese: 皇上派了多芒的轻骑兵师往探察那斑点。

sentences.english: Exploring the overgrown purlieus of the temple.
sentences.chinese: 探察杂草丛生的寺院周围地区。

definition: to check/to investigate/to probe (into)
to examine/to probe/to scout out/to nose around
to find out/to ascertain/to get an idea of
to make inquiries/to try to find out/to pry
to make discreet inquiries/to scout out
to pry into/to spy on/to probe into
to investigate a crime/to scout/to reconnoiter/reconnaissance/detection/a scout
to watch/to look carefully at
to peep at/to spy on/to peek
secret agent/detective
response/reaction/interaction/irritability (biol.)/induction (elec.)/inductance
to sneak up on
to visit/to go to see what's going on
to inquire into/to ask after
to pry into or spy on/to snoop/to peep/to poke one's nose into/to peer/to get a glimpse of
to detect/to sense
